data.claim: DURO OS Operational Rules: (1) One Screen per Day Drill - 45-90min, full OS end-to-end, save inputs+outputs; (2) 3-3-1 Constraint - 3 hierarchy levels, 3 principles, 1 intentional break with job description; (3) Upgraded Scorecard - for each score write "what made this X instead of 5?" and "what single change would +1?"; (4) Before Reading Test - blur/squint 2sec, answer instantly: main action? mood? eye first?; (5) 5-Motion Budget - primary CTA, hierarchy reveal, feedback, navigation, one mood move - anything else must justify like asking for funding.
